overview:
David is responsible for bringing eBureau’s powerful predictive analytics capabilities to online markets.

David has been a pioneer in online marketing since 1997. He joined eBureau in December 2007, bringing a successful track record of executive leadership at growing both private and public venture-backed companies.

David is responsible for bringing eBureauâ€™s powerful predictive analytics capabilities to online markets. In his previous role as General Manager and SVP, Marketing Analytics at Adteractive, David managed a team of 45 people, spanning all of Adteractiveâ€™s business units. Under his leadership, Adteractive became one of the fastest growing private companies in America and a leader in online lead generation. Prior to Adteractive, David held executive roles at Drugstore.com and NextCard, Inc, where he was responsible for product management and customer acquisition. David began his career as a software engineer at Decision Systems, a research and development firm focused on voice telephony solutions for the health care industry.

David earned a degree in Symbolic Systems (BS) from Stanford University in 1990 and a Masters of Business Administration from the Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley.
